rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that aligns with Vastu principles by ensuring proper directional placement to invite positive energy. It is small yet functional.
rooms.notes: Keep a clear path from the main door to living spaces.

rooms.description: spacious living area designed for family gatherings with ample natural light and aligned according to Vastu, facing south or west.
rooms.notes: Consider large windows for ventilation and light.

rooms.description: A dedicated dining space adjacent to the living room, optimized for both functionality and Vastu compliance by having a clear view of the garden.
rooms.notes: Ensure seating arrangement that promotes unity.

rooms.description: Compact kitchen designed with efficiency in mind, positioned away from living spaces to maintain privacy. Vastu guidelines suggest placing the kitchen in a north or northeast corner.
A small room for domestic help, ensuring adherence to local building norms.
A dual-car garage integrated with the ground floor design, placed towards the periphery of the villa for ease of access while maintaining structural balance.

openings.description: A single entry door on the main facade, designed with Vastu alignment in mind to invite auspicious energy.
openings.notes: Ensure proper clearance from garden entrance.

openings.description: Multiple windows distributed across living and dining areas for natural light and cross ventilation, adhering to local building codes.
openings.notes: Include window shutters or blinds as per budget considerations.

garden_area.description: A large garden space integrated with the villa layout, ensuring ample greenery and privacy while aligning with Vastu principles.
garden_area.notes: Consider low maintenance landscaping and local flora.

budget_constraints.optimization: Cost-effective materials and efficient design to minimize expenses without compromising quality.
budget_constraints.notes: Focus on multi-functional spaces and minimal external finishes.
